creditline: Gift of Rev. Richard Lewis Hillstrom
inscription: Inscribed in pencil, verso: Dogtown 1934 No 16 S-337 RC-10297
medium: Pen and black ink on paper, mounted on cardboard
provenance: The artist; Estate of the artist, 1943 (Inv. no. 319); [Kraushaar Galleries, New York]; [Babcock Galleries, New York, until 1957 (Inv. no. C-10297), sold to Hillstrom]; Rev. Richard Lewis Hillstrom, St. Paul, Minn., 1957-93 (RLH Coll. no. 103); given to MIA, 1993.
signed: Signed and inscribed in pencil, LR: Marsden Hartley / Dogtown-Gloucester
title: Dogtown, Gloucester
